article.title: Camgian to Support Development of Revolutionary Micro Technologies
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Camgian Microsystems Corporation, Starkville, Mississippi, was awarded a $9 million contract to support the advanced integrated microsystems project to develop revolutionary technology that will enable improvements in size and endurance over generations systems, such as micro satellites, micro-unmanned aeronautical vehicles, and body worn electronics. Air Force Research Laboratory, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
